Name.BusinessNameLine1: INT'L ALLIANCE OF THEATRICAL STAGE EMPLOYES

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: THE IMPROVEMENT OF THE SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CONDITIONS OF EMPLOYEES IDENTIFIED WITH THE THEATRICAL, MOVING PICTURE,ENTERTAINMENT, AMUSEMENT AND COMMERCIAL OR INDUSTRIAL SHOW INDUSTRIES.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE PURPOSE OF THE INTERNATIONAL IS TO ACHIEVE, BY ORGANIZATION AND MUTUAL ENDEAVOR, THE IMPROVEMENT OF THE SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CONDITIONS OF EMPLOYEES IDENTIFIED WITH THE THEATRICAL, MOVING PICTURE, ENTERTAINMENT, AMUSEMENT AND COMMERCIAL OR INDUSTRIAL SHOW INDUSTRIES OF THE UNITED STATES AND CANADA. IN ADDITION, THE INTERNATIONAL SEEKS TO INSURE THE MAINTENANCE OF A FAIR RATE OF WAGES, TO ENSURE THE EMPLOYMENT OF ALL MEMBERS, AND TO SECURE BY UNITY OF ACTION, WISE, HONORABLE, AND CONSERVATIVE MEDIATION, SO THAT EQUITY MAY BE OBTAINED.
IRS990.Description: THE IMPROVEMENT OF THE SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CONDITIONS OF EMPLOYEES IDENTIFIED WITH THE THEATRICAL, MOVING PICTURE, ENTERTAINMENT, AMUSEMENT AND COMMERCIAL OR INDUSTRIAL SHOW INDUSTRIES OF THE UNITED STATES AND CANADA. IN ADDITION, THE INTERNATIONAL SEEKS TO INSURE THE MAINTENANCE OF A FAIR RATE OF WAGES, TO ENSURE THE EMPLOYMENT OF ALL MEMBERS, AND TO SECURE BY UNITY OF ACTION, WISE, HONORABLE, AND CONSERVATIVE MEDIATION, SO THAT EQUITY MAY BE OBTAINED.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Identifier: OTHER COMPREHENSIVE INCOME (LOSS) - PENSION RELATED CHARGES

Form990ScheduleFPartIV.Explanation: All the grants are approved by the general executive body and proper records are kept for the contributions made to organizations outside the US.

RecipientNameBusiness.BusinessNameLine1: Americas Agenda Health Care of All

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Grants and donations to US organizations
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: All the grants and donations are approved by General executive body and records are kept for all the donations and contributions made.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE CONSTITUTION AND THE BY-LAWS OF THE INTERNATIONAL, ALL OFFICERS ARE MEMBERS OF THE INTERNATIONAL.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: REVIEW PROCESS OF THE TAX RETURN
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE GOVERNING BODY DELEGATES FORM 990 REVIEW RESPONSABILITY TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. MEMBERS OF THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEW AND APPROVE FORM 990 BEFORE IT IS FILED.
ALL EXECUTIVE MEMBERS COMPENSATIONS ARE APPROVED BY THE LOCAL UNION REPRESENTATIVES AT A QUADRENNIAL CONVENTION.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: HOW TO MAKE TAX RETURN AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Available at office for public inspection
